title: Colorado mountains to see dangerous avalanche conditions, officials say
description: An incoming snowstorm is expected to cause dangerous avalanche conditions throughout Colorado’s Park, Gore and Front Range mountains this weekend, state officials said.
content:
An incoming snowstorm is expected to cause dangerous avalanche conditions throughout Colorados Park, Gore and Front Range mountains this weekend, state officials said.
The Colorado Avalanche Informa… [+1585 chars]
de: In den Bergen Colorados herrscht gefährliche Lawinengefahr, sagen Beamte. Es wird erwartet, dass ein aufkommender Schneesturm an diesem Wochenende gefährliche Lawinenbedingungen in den Park-, Gore- und Front Range-Bergen Colorados auslösen wird, sagten Staatsbeamte.
en: Colorado mountains to see dangerous avalanche conditions, officials say. An incoming snowstorm is expected to cause dangerous avalanche conditions throughout Colorado’s Park, Gore and Front Range mountains this weekend, state officials said.
la: Montes Colorado videre condiciones periculosas avalanche, magistratus dicunt. Tempestas nivis advenientis expectatur ut condiciones avalanche periculosas per Colorado's Park, Gore et Front Range montes in hac weekend, officiales civitatis dixerunt.

title: Winter Storm Warning As 20 Inches of Snow To Hit: 'Avalanche Danger'
description: Residents in certain areas have been warned that the heavy snowfall could result in whiteout conditions and a risk of avalanches.
content:
Residents in certain areas have been warned that the heavy snowfall could result in whiteout conditions and a risk of avalanches.

title: Telluride plans to open this weekend even as contentious ski patrollers union talks continue
description: In recent weeks, negotiations have turned contentious with the union voting to authorize a strike and subsequently staging a practice picket in downtown Telluride.
content:
Telluride Ski Resort is scheduled to open this Saturday — a week later than originally planned — after winter storms dropped much-needed snow on the mountains in southwestern Colorado.
The resort an… [+3287 chars]
de: Telluride plant die Eröffnung an diesem Wochenende, auch wenn die umstrittenen Gespräche mit der Gewerkschaft der Skipatrouillen andauern. In den letzten Wochen wurden die Verhandlungen kontrovers, da die Gewerkschaft für die Genehmigung eines Streiks stimmte und anschließend eine Übungsdemonstration in der Innenstadt von Telluride veranstaltete.
en: Telluride plans to open this weekend even as contentious ski patrollers union talks continue. In recent weeks, negotiations have turned contentious with the union voting to authorize a strike and subsequently staging a practice picket in downtown Telluride.
la: Telluride consilia hanc volutpat aperiunt etiam ut contentiones ski perambulatores unionis colloquiorum perseverent. His proximis hebdomadibus, tractatus cum suffragio unionis contentiosos verterunt ad ictus auctorizandum et postea exercitium stationis in media urbe Telluride trahentes.

title: Looking for thrills? Try heli-skiing in Albania's wild Accursed Mountains
description: Some say the devil himself created the Accursed Mountains, otherwise known as the albanian alps, which form a fierce wall across neighbouring Kosovo and Montenegro. But these Balkan beauties offer wild frontier terrain for intrepid heli-skiers.
content:
This article was produced by National Geographic Traveller (UK).
Being dropped off by a helicopter 2,200m up a snow-covered mountainside is a rush of noise and chaotic motion. I cant be sure whats u… [+10500 chars]
de: Auf der Suche nach Nervenkitzel? Versuchen Sie Heliskiing in den wilden Verfluchten Bergen Albaniens. Manche sagen, der Teufel selbst habe die Verfluchten Berge, auch bekannt als die albanischen Alpen, erschaffen, die eine gewaltige Mauer über den benachbarten Kosovo und Montenegro bilden. Aber diese Schönheiten des Balkans bieten unerschrockenen Heliskifahrern wildes Grenzland.
en: Looking for thrills? Try heli-skiing in Albania's wild Accursed Mountains. Some say the devil himself created the Accursed Mountains, otherwise known as the albanian alps, which form a fierce wall across neighbouring Kosovo and Montenegro. But these Balkan beauties offer wild frontier terrain for intrepid heli-skiers.
la: Quaerite inaccessos? Conare heli-skiing in Albania montes feras exsecrabiles. Aliqui dicunt ipsum diabolum Montes exsecrabiles creasse, alias Alpes albanas notas, quae ferocem murum trans Kosovo et Montenegro vicinas formant. Sed hae pulchri- tudines Haemi ferae fines offerunt pro intrepidis heli-natoribus.

title: Milan's hockey rink still isn't ready. Will NHL players skip another Winter Olympics?
description: Will the National Hockey League pull its players from the upcoming Winter Olympics in Italy? It's an open question since the Santagiulia Ice Hockey Arena, on the outskirts of Milan, is still under construction.
content:
Will the National Hockey League pull its players from the upcoming Winter Olympics in Italy? 
It's an open question since the Santagiulia Ice Hockey Arena, on the outskirts of Milan, is still under … [+2060 chars]

Wird die National Hockey League ihre Spieler von den bevorstehenden Olympischen Winterspielen in Italien abziehen? Das ist eine offene Frage, da sich die Eishockey-Arena Santagiulia am Stadtrand von Mailand noch im Bau befindet.
en: Milan's hockey rink still isn't ready. Will NHL players skip another Winter Olympics?. Will the National Hockey League pull its players from the upcoming Winter Olympics in Italy? title: Telluride owner threatens price hikes if ski resort ‘caves’ to union demands
description: Owner Chuck Horning, who has a fraught relationship with the local community, is on the offensive this week after patrollers rejected the resort "last, best and final" contract offer.

en: Telluride owner threatens price hikes if ski resort ‘caves’ to union demands. Owner Chuck Horning, who has a fraught relationship with the local community, is on the offensive this week after patrollers rejected the resort "last, best and final" contract offer.

title: MetaMask rolls out Transaction Shield, a new transaction loss protection feature
description:
MetaMask debuts Transaction Shield to give users added protection on verified transactions with monthly coverage up to $10,000.
The post MetaMask rolls out Transaction Shield, a new transaction loss protection feature appeared first on Crypto Briefing.
content:
Key Takeaways
  • MetaMask introduces Transaction Shield, a premium opt in security upgrade with transaction loss protection and priority support.
  • Subscribers receive coverage up to $10,… [+927 chars]
de:
MetaMask führt Transaction Shield ein, eine neue Funktion zum Schutz vor Transaktionsverlusten. MetaMask führt Transaction Shield ein, um Benutzern zusätzlichen Schutz bei verifizierten Transaktionen mit einer monatlichen Deckung von bis zu 10.000 US-Dollar zu bieten.
Der Beitrag MetaMask führt Transaction Shield ein, eine neue Funktion zum Schutz vor Transaktionsverlusten, die erstmals auf Crypto Briefing erschien.
en:
MetaMask rolls out Transaction Shield, a new transaction loss protection feature. MetaMask debuts Transaction Shield to give users added protection on verified transactions with monthly coverage up to $10,000.
The post MetaMask rolls out Transaction Shield, a new transaction loss protection feature appeared first on Crypto Briefing.
la:
MetaMask evolvitur Transaction clypeus, nova transactionis amissio pluma tutelae. MetaMask debutit transactioni clipeum ad tutelam usorum additam dare in transactionibus verificatis cum menstrua coverage usque ad $10,000.
Post MetaMask evolvit Transaction Scutum, novum transactionis detrimentum pluma tutelae apparuit primum in Crypto Briefing.
